sub_fields.label: Additional Section Settings
sub_fields.name: section_heading_settings
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a section header/footer in a standard block.

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Displays the number of column(s) in a standard block body.

fields.label: Header
fields.name: header_logo
fields.instructions: Sets the logo for the header of the site.

fields.label: Footer
fields.name: footer_logo
fields.instructions: Sets the logo for the footer of the site.
